subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick beat James Blake, 6-3, 7-5, in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open at the Indian Wells Tennis Garden in Indian Wells, Calif.
snippet: Andy Roddick beat James Blake, 6-3, 7-5, in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open at the Indian Wells Tennis Garden in Indian Wells, Calif.
